headline: TKO Uses UFC Good Greek Deal To Extend Year Round Sponsorship Reach
summary: UFC, part of NYSE:TKO, has entered a new multiyear marketing partnership with Good Greek Moving & Storage. The agreement brings Good Greek branding to UFC Fight Nights and Dana White's Contender Series, along with athlete ambassador campaigns. The partnership is structured as a multi-platform sponsorship across live events and promotional content. TKO Group Holdings, through UFC, is continuing to use sponsorships tied to high-visibility combat sports content, including UFC Fight Nights and...

headline: UFC FIGHT NIGHT® To Take Place During BEYOND Week 2026
summary: BEYOND Expo 2026 today announced a focused collaboration that will feature UFC, the world's premier mixed martial arts organization, as part of a dedicated Open Innovation Program during BEYOND Week, May 27-31, 2026. This initiative will explore how emerging technologies are reshaping athlete performance, wellness, and the future of sports and entertainment.
